TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConventionAnnotatable implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.IAnnotatable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IConventionAnnotatable implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.IReadOnlyAnnotatable

summary.para: A class that exposes annotations that can be modified. Annotations allow for arbitrary metadata to be stored on an object.
This interface is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.remarks: See Model building conventions for more information and examples.
